attributes.action: Ban Animals Being Offered As Prizes Or Freebies At Fairgrounds, Funfairs, Etc.
attributes.additional_details: It IS Cruel To Offer An Animal, Usually Goldfish/Cold Water Fish, As A Prize Or Consolation Prize Or Freebie When The Person Receiving The Animal Has No Clear Instructions On The Care Routine Of The Animal Or Health & Safety Advice For The Well-being Of The Animal (The First Of Many No-Nos Is Water Straight Out Of The Tap Is Lethal To Fish! Please Sign This Petition To Stop This Cruel Abuse Of These Poor Creatures.
attributes.background: Ban Animals Being Offered As Prizes Or Freebies At Fairgrounds, Funfairs, Etc.
